short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: transforms your new tab page into a serene retreat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Serenity Stream aims to bring a sense of calm and tranquility to your browsing experience. Featuring a peaceful waterfall scene as the background, this extension transforms your new tab page into a serene retreat. It includes an optimized search bar and customizable shortcuts, along with essential information like time and weather, all designed to keep you focused and relaxed while you browse.
